record.id: field.name="primary.query" and file.name="report" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: primary.query
record.file.name: report

brief.brief: The query to retrieve records from the primary file or the query to retrieve records from the sortwork table.

detail.detail: You can use the primary query to retrieve records directly from the report, or you can use it in conjunction with stacked queries.
If you define stacked queries for the report, Service Manager creates a sortwork table and uses the primary query to retrieve the records from the sortwork table.
You could set it up to perform a separate query on the sortwork table, but this would be an unusual case and would more than likely impair the turnaround time of the report.
